name: Unity Games Bundle - 2022 Game Collection
description:
This bundle contains 20 games published on itch in 2022.

These are complete game source codes. Easy to reskin and publish.

By purchasing this bundle you will get a big discount.

All these games cost $380 if you purchase them separately, so this bundle will save you $310.

If you want to test these games on your browser or android device please go to my profile and you will find test links on each project description.

Games that are included in this bundle (click on the links for a youtube video):

  1. Arrow Racer - $19
  2. Asteroids - $19
  3. Color Matcher - $19
  4. Color Run - $19
  5. Color Swipe - $19
  6. Connect Balls - $19
  7. Fast Finger - $19
  8. Fill The Cups - $19
  9. Finger Football - $19
  10. Follow The Path - $19
  11. Infinite Loop - $19
  12. Jumping Ball - $19
  13. Platform Jumper - $19
  14. Skillful Driver - $19
  15. Space Climber - $19
  16. Space Tower - $19
  17. Spikes Everywhere - $19
  18. Spinning Around - $19
  19. Stack Tower - $19
  20. Up Down - $19
